org.netbeans.core.network.proxy.pac

Interface PacScriptEvaluatorFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NbPacScriptEvaluatorFactory

    public interface PacScriptEvaluatorFactory
    Creates PAC Script evaluator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PacScriptEvaluator createPacScriptEvaluator(String pacSource)
      Creates a PAC evaluator based on the given JavaScript source code.
      PacScriptEvaluator getNoOpEvaluator()
      Gets a no-op PAC evaluator, meaning one which always returns Proxy.NO_PROXY for any call to PacScriptEvaluator.findProxyForURL(java.net.URI)

    • Method Detail

      • createPacScriptEvaluator

        PacScriptEvaluator createPacScriptEvaluator(String pacSource)
                                     throws PacParsingException
        Creates a PAC evaluator based on the given JavaScript source code.

        The evaluator must treat the pacSource as untrusted and evaluate it in a sandbox.

        The method will throw PacParsingException if the JavaScript input cannot be parsed/interpreted. In this case you may opt to either do nothing, report to logging system or use a no-op evaluator as an alternative.

        Parameters:
        pacSource - The JavaScript source code of the PAC script, as a string. To be a correct PAC script, it must implement the FindProxyForURL(url, host) function. Most often the PAC script is downloaded from a network location.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PacParsingException - if the source code cannot be parsed

      • getNoOpEvaluator

        PacScriptEvaluator getNoOpEvaluator()
        Gets a no-op PAC evaluator, meaning one which always returns Proxy.NO_PROXY for any call to PacScriptEvaluator.findProxyForURL(java.net.URI)
        Returns:
